mapper.select: select f.id, f.genre_type, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_type, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date, mp.profile_nickname, mp.member_id, m.profile_img_url from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.id = #{memberId} order by f.id desc limit #{myPagePagination.startRow}, #{myPagePagination.rowCount};
select count(*) from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.id = #{memberId};

select f.id ,bfp.id, bfp.funding_send_status , fp.product_name, fp.product_price , bfp_mp .profile_name, bfp_mp .profile_email from tbl_buy_funding_product bfp join tbl_funding_product fp on bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id join tbl_funding f on fp.funding_id = f.id and f.id = #{fundingPostId} join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bfp_mp on bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id;
